Class KeystoneGlobalState

  • Field Details

    • CloseSelection

      public static boolean CloseSelection
      If true, target the block a set distance in front of player. If false, target the block the player is looking at, ignoring distance

    • CloseSelectionDistance

      public static double CloseSelectionDistance
      If CloseSelection is true, this is the distance in front of the player that will be targeted

    • AllowPlayerLook

      public static boolean AllowPlayerLook
      Whether mouse movement should move the player camera

    • MouseOverGUI

      public static boolean MouseOverGUI
      Whether the mouse is hovering over an interactable overlay widget

    • GuiConsumingKeys

      public static boolean GuiConsumingKeys
      If true, either a vanilla screen is open or a TextFieldWidget is focused. This will disable any keybinds with the NO_GUI_OPEN condition and enable an keybinds with the GUI_OPEN condition

    • BlockingKeys

      public static boolean BlockingKeys
      If true, all keybinds will be disabled. This is used to force the player to wait for something, such as flushing the WorldChangeQueueModule

    • SuppressingBlockTicks

      public static boolean SuppressingBlockTicks
      If true, all block ticks will be ignored. This is manually changed by the player for things like ignoring block gravity

    • HideSelectionBoxes

      public static boolean HideSelectionBoxes
      If true, selection boxes will not be rendered

    • HighlightTileEntities

      public static boolean HighlightTileEntities
      If true, tile entities will be highlighted with a yellow box

  • Constructor Details

    • KeystoneGlobalState

      public KeystoneGlobalState()
